hero.content1: We want to share this diverse creativity of Dali with all our Web3 friends and invite you all to come here to party, connect and have a good time.
hero.content2: In the spirit of WAMO, we will be hosting the Summer of WAMO | Dali Web3 Fest in this August, 19-20th.

content.title: Content
content.text_01: The first massive Web3 event in China that owned, co-created and organized only by its members, without any centralized leadership.
content.text_02: Bring together Web3 & DAO communities for deep dialogues, connections and co-creation.
content.text_03: Share ideas, exchange technical insights, explore the future of DAO, incentive mechanism, public goods and future societies. Find innovative ways to create better open source solutions, positive-sum outcomes and positive externalities.
content.day1_text_01: Crypto Trends, The History of Web3
content.camp1_desc_1: Showcase the culture and lifestyle of Dali,
content.camp1_desc_2: which focuses on social issues and sustainable community development
content.camp3_desc_1: Dali local art, natural music performance,
content.camp4_desc_1: Made of medium-sized tents and distributed to sponsors and their teams
content.camp4_desc_2: as a venue for camping, team activities and meetup
content.camp5_desc_1: Music camp: Musicians will be playing here
content.camp5_desc_2: Have-fun camp: skateboards, shuttlecocks, frisbees, and poker
content.camp5_desc_3: Culture experience camp: Dali special activities like flower cake making

about.title: About the Summer of WAMO
about.small_content_1: DAOs are bringing like-minded folks together from all around the world. We’re bonding through internet protocol, open sourcesoftware, tokens, governance, chat groups and forum proposals—and it’s all driven by the Community.
about.small_content_2: We are a community dedicated to the vision of an open internet of value. A fairer and richer world for all.
about.small_content_3: We’re internet natives who believe in an open internet of value. Where communities drive our world forward through transparency.
about.small_content_4: We are people first. It’s all about people. Bet on people, have faith, back others, believe in people. Everything we do is for the community and those around us.
about.small_content_5: We value being action oriented. Move fast and be willing.
about.small_content_6: We thrive in chaos. We are comfortable with being uncomfortable. We grow under pressure.
about.small_content_7: We back ourselves. We believe in the work we are doing.
about.small_content_8: We have fun. YOLO. We have a dancing chilli as a logo.
about.small_content_contet_1: We want to build a process that’s verifiable and accessible to all participants out in the open
about.small_content_contet_2: We want to encourage member driven contributions so all involved stakeholders have input on key collective decisions, avoiding unilateral or misrepresentative outcomes that don’t build toward the goals of the event.
about.small_content_contet_3: strengthen and foster relationships between participants building toward a common goal…
about.small_content_contet_4: We want to source diverse people, ideas, and perspectives by building a  a collaborative environment that’s accessible and has low barriers to entry for anyone to learn and gain from the experience.

venue.title: Venue
venue.address: DaLi Flowers for Lifetime Farm, 大理市银桥镇大丽线新邑村委会七社8号
venue.since: Since the pandemic, Web3 developer, enthusiasts and digital nomads have grown exponentially in Dali.To some extent, Dali has gradually become the Web3 center of China, especially for DAOs.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.fq_content_1_1: 欢迎您加入我们，成为我们的赞助商。在Web3这样一样去中心化的世界里，我们和赞助伙伴的合作不仅是商业上的往来，更是价值观的交汇。您的每一笔赞助将获得全面的商业回报，同时它也在为Web3 这样一个开放、多元、自由的社区添砖加瓦。
sponsors.fq_content_3_1: All speakers, sponsors and Tier 1&2  Mirror NFT holders will be invted to special welcoming party before the event.
